#summary Entity plugin description.

= Entity plugin =

Entity is a simple syntax plugin allows you to insert [http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/sgml/entities.html HTML character entities] on a DokuWiki page.


== Syntax ==

To insert an entity just duplicate ampersand and semicolon characters:

{{{
a &&le;; b

90&&deg;;
}}}

This code will render as:

  a ≤ b

  90°
